value: /*This do-file generates the country data used in the empirical analysis.*/
*For market size we use total GDP from the World Bank World Development Indicators database
** Exchange Rate data are taken from databank.worldbank.org
** Consumer price indeces are taken from from databank.worldbank.org
* We proxy transportation costs by geographic distance taken from http://www.cepii.fr/anglaisgraph/bdd/distances.htm
**MARKET SPECIFIC FIXED COSTS proxied by information taken from WORLD-BANK DOING BUSINESS (WBDB) dataset

*We use the primary factor (Market Costs) derived from principal component analysis as that factor accounts for most of the variance of the 3 original indicators (number of documents for importing, cost of importing and time to import).
**Convert the WBDB country code with the Italian country code
** Generate the proxy for Market-Specific fixed costs (WBDB_extraEU)
**COUNTRY-LEVEL FIXED COSTS proxied by the quality of governance and contracting taken from WORLD BANK GOVERNANCE dataset

*We use the primary factor (Governance) derived from principal component analysis as that factor accounts for most of the variance of the 6 original indicators (Voice and Accountability, Political Stability and Absence of Violence/Terrorism, Government Effectiveness, Regulatory Quality, Rule of Law, Control of Corruption.).
**Convert the WBDB country code with the Italian country code
** Generate the proxy for Country-level fixed costs (factor1ST_extraEU)
